Description: Anaam International Group Holding (known as: Anaam Holding) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1994. Anaam Holding operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Packaged Foods and Meats. It has Companies operating across UAE and Saudi Arabia. Anaam Holding is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1982.
